<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v5/repos/{owner}/{repo}/pulls/{number}/issues"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>





<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"number","in":"path","description":"第几个PR，即本仓库PR的序数。对应iid","required":true,"example":"","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"owner","in":"path","description":"仓库所属空间地址(企业、组织或个人的地址path)","required":true,"example":"","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"repo","in":"path","description":"仓库路径(path)","required":true,"example":"","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"page","in":"query","description":"page","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","description":"当前页码"}},{"name":"per_page","in":"query","description":"pageSize","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","description":"每页的项目数"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
